content:
Hey, welcome to <:discohook:736648398081622016> **Discohook**! The easiest way to personalize your Discord server.

There's more info below if you want to read it. When you're ready, press **Clear All** at the top of the editor to delete what's written here.

_ _

embeds.title: What is this?
embeds.description: At its core, Discohook is a simple message designer. You can use it to send fully customizable messages to your Discord server with the use of [webhooks](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/228383668).

fields.name: Discohook Utils - complementary bot
fields.value: You can [invite our bot here](https://discohook.app/bot). In case you recognize that name, Discohook [merged with Discohook Utils](https://discohook.app/guide/deprecated/migrate-utils) in 2024. If you have Discobot in your server, invite Discohook Utils instead for all future use.

embeds.title: Get started
embeds.description:
- To send your first webhook message, click **Add Webhook** at the top left of the editor.
- You'll be prompted to put in the URL of a webhook you have already created, or make a new one on the spot with **Create Webhook**.
 - If you create a new webhook with this button, you'll be able to add buttons to your message as well.
- Finish up by clicking **Add Webhook** inside the prompt.
 - You should now see your webhook name & avatar at the top of the editor. If you would like to edit this webhook, click the pencil icon. To change the name/avatar for just one message, use the **Profile** section of the editor.
- Now click **Send**. Choose which messages you would like to send with your webhook (they are all enabled by default).

fields.name: **注目英雄**
fields.value:
明日からなので気が早いですが、細かくと計算や画立てる方のために事前告知

- <:emblemfire:989041476833017886> [バーソロミュー](https://bbcamp.info/herodb/stravia) :new:
- <:emblemdark:989041586996391946> [エルスベス](https://bbcamp.info/herodb/ascian) :new:
※この2体、数値などにやや自信なしですのでご注意を
※★5はこの2年でリリースされた英雄：478体

fields.name: __**サモンコスト**__
fields.value:
<:gems:990510652760154112>のみ
- 1サモン：450<:gems:990510652760154112> 
- 10サモン：3900<:gems:990510652760154112>
- 30サモン：10800<:gems:990510652760154112>

きょうyりょくボーナスドローあり、1サモンごとに最低1回の追加ドロー獲得
詳細は<:kblogo:990882922192072724>知識ベースでどうぞ（英雄リストもあるよ）

[豊作サモン2025](https://bbcamp.info/docs/harvest-summon-2025/)

**確率**
- ★3レア：71.0%
- ★4エピック：26.5%
- ★5レジェンド：2.3%
- ★5レジェンド注目英雄：0.3%
